text.div:
This code system http://phr.kanta.fi/fiphr-cs-moderatetovigorouspa defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
82290-8-24h Daily Moderate to Vigorous Physical Activity in minutesDaily PA minutes with MET > 2.9

Additional Language Displays

CodeEnglish (English, en)Finnish (fi)Swedish (sv)
82290-8-24hDaily moderate to vigorous physical activity, minPäivittäinen kohtuullisen ja raskaan liikunnan määrä minuutteinaMåttlig eller hård aktivitet per dag, minuter

name: fiphr-cs-moderatetovigorouspa
title: Code System Finnish PHR Moderate to Vigorous Physical Activity Fitness Observation Code
description: Finnish PHR Fitness Codesystem, that defines the code used for daily minutes of moderate to vigorous physical activity. Will be replaced with LOINC system code when available.

concept.display: Daily Moderate to Vigorous Physical Activity in minutes

designation.value: Päivittäinen kohtuullisen ja raskaan liikunnan määrä minuutteina
Måttlig eller hård aktivitet per dag, minuter
Daily moderate to vigorous physical activity, min
